sentence: Kemp Signs Bills Banning Books, Classroom Discussion of Race, and Trans Athletes Georgia Republican Governor Brian Kemp has signed a raft of bills overhauling public education in the state, including one banning books deemed to be offensive? from school libraries.
title: U.N. Warns Humans Have Degraded 40% of Earths Land
